title: Ahri's crushers. riot please fix grammar. you are adults who've gone through the education system
body: this is embarrassing. a lot of leagues i see are like this. fix please

replies.body:
"riot please fix grammar."
If you are gonna rip on someone for using grammar incorrectly, at least start the sentences doing so with a capital letter.

> [{quoted}](name=Slim Chaedi,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=N0IdvLrc,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-02-25T05:31:02.452+0000)
>
> "riot please fix grammar."
> If you are gonna rip on someone for using grammar incorrectly, at least start the sentences doing so with a capital letter.

His FEK is anime, he's a weeaboo, they can't spell %%%% correctly regardless.
